== Main Inclusion Report for KTorrent ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/k/ktorrent, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Kubuntu users deserve a bitorrent client
 0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review:
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** No showstopper <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/pkgreport.cgi?which=pkg&data=ktorrent&archive=no&version=&dist=unstable|Debian bugs]]</nowiki> (except does not build on m64k).
** Good maintenance in Debian.
** Active upstream. http://ktorrent.pwsp.net
** No critical confirmed bugs in <nowiki>[[http://bugs.kde.org/buglist.cgi?product=ktorrent&bug_status=UNCONFIRMED&bug_status=NEW&bug_status=ASSIGNED&bug_status=REOPENED|KDE bug tracker]]</nowiki>
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Standard debhelper packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
